name: MineralManager
short_description: MineralVein is a plugin designed to increase available resources per chunk by causing admin specified blocks to re spawn after a set period of time. The plugin also allows for degradation that causes some blocks to simply disappear as normal to prevent inflation. Whenever a block is mined, MineralVein checks to see if that block is managed. Then it checks to see if the block should degrade and if not replaces the block with a placeholder and drops its resources as normal. After a set amount of time the placeholder will revert to its original state and will once again be available for mining.
summary: A plugin for Minecraft server's based on the Bukkit API.
